de.axnsoftware.settings.impl.accessor

Interface IAccessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IContainerItemAccessor<T>, IContainerPropertyAccessor, IPropertyAccessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccessorImpl, AbstractArrayItemAccessorImpl, AbstractContainerItemAccessorImpl, AbstractContainerPropertyAccessorImpl, AbstractListItemAccessorImpl, AbstractMapItemAccessorImpl, AbstractPropertyAccessorImpl, ArrayPropertyAccessorImpl, BranchArrayItemAccessorImpl, BranchListItemAccessorImpl, BranchMapItemAccessorImpl, BranchPropertyAccessorImpl, LeafArrayItemAccessorImpl, LeafListItemAccessorImpl, LeafMapItemAccessorImpl, LeafPropertyAccessorImpl, ListPropertyAccessorImpl, MapPropertyAccessorImpl, RootAccessorImpl

    public interface IAccessor
extends Cloneable
    The interface IAccessor models the root of a hierarchy of derived interfaces. Accessors provide the system with the ability to traverse an object tree and both retrieve values from and set values in such an object tree.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Carsten Klein "cklein"

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object clone()
      Creates a deep copy of this.
      void copyValue(Object source, Object target)
      Copies the value of the property represented by this from the specified source to the specified target.
      List<IAccessor> getChildAccessors()
      Returns the child accessors.
      String getKey()
      Returns the unqualified key of the property represented by this.
      IAccessor getParentAccessor()
      Returns the parent accessor.
      String getQualifiedKey()
      Returns the qualified key of the property, e.g. org.example.timeout.
      IAccessor getRootAccessor()
      Gets the root accessor.
      Class<?> getType()
      Gets the type of the property represented by this.
      Map<Class<?>,ITypeMapper> getTypeMappings()
      Gets the available type mappings from the root accessor.
      Object getValue(Object settingsRoot)
      Gets the value of the property represented by this from the specified settingsRoot.
      void readFromProperties(IBackingStore properties, Object settingsRoot)
      Reads the value of the property represented by this from the specified properties into the specified settingsRoot.
      void setChildAccessors(List<IAccessor> childAccessors)
      Replaces the existing child accessors with the specified childAccessors.
      void setKey(String key)
      Replaces the existing key with the specified key.
      void setParentAccessor(IAccessor parentAccessor)
      Replaces the existing parent accessor with the specified parentAccessor.
      void setType(Class<?> type)
      Replaces the existing type with the specified type.
      void writeToProperties(IBackingStore properties, Object settingsRoot)
      Gets the value of the property represented by this from the specified settingsRoot and writes it to the specified properties.
